name: Shadows Of The Void
description:
[IMPORTANT] If you test out the Game, please support the development by leaving feedback in the Google Sheet at the Bottom.

Fast-Paced, PvP focused  Hack and Slash Game inspired by Devil May Cry series, Metal Gear Rising, , solely developed by me (Ziet Cornis) for now,
The game itself will be FREE , but with paid Skin DLC

Planned Features:

- Dynamic Combo System in 3rd Person

- Character Creator

- Ranked Server

- in-Game Skins Store

Google Sheet:

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1_6Y071f7HOFMlrwn3lYEb1jGMmJHQxqsWs4wht4kj58/edit?usp=sharing
